So I've identified three schools: Orleans, Paoli, and Springs Valley, all listed under county "59 orange". Each of these corresponds to row indices 2, 3, and 5.

The claim is TRUE because there are three schools (Orleans, Paoli, Springs Valley) listed under county "59 orange". The relevant cells are from the 'county' column in rows 2, 3, and 5.
